directions.text: Pat chicken dry and season it with pepper.
Dredge cutlets through flour in a shallow dish.
Sprinkle 2 tsp of minced sage on top of cutlets and then press a slice of prosciutto on each.
Heat oil in a large walled pan and fry 4 large sage leaves for 15 seconds over medium high heat.
Set leaves on a paper towel to dry off.
Fry cutlets prosciutto side down for 2 mins then flip and fry again for 1 min.
Transfer cutlets to a plate and cover with aluminum foil.
Reduce heat to medium and cook shallot for 2 mins.
Add ½ tsp flour and cook for 1 min while stirring constantly.
Add broth and vermouth, bring to a simmer and let reduce for 4 mins.
Return cutlets to pan for 30 secs and transfer to serving plates.
Off heat whisk in butter, parsley, lemon juice, a pinch of salt, and a pinch of pepper.
Pour sauce over chicken, then top each with a fried sage leaf.
